overview: Tonight you can take anyone, behind the mask. Take a journey through five sumptuous scenes of deviant desire and carnal lust. Take a peek behind the facade of a decadent Venetian ball. Gorgeous masked women writhe naked in the throes of passion, fucking their holes with huge toys. As their Maskerade partners arrive, they open their hungry pussies and tight asses to wet tongues and monster cocks. And as the beautiful people remove their masks, the orgy of expressionless faces takes shape and becomes a frenzied hardcore feast. Beautifully shot by award-winning British director Kendo, Maskerade stars top British and European stars giving their finest, filthiest performances.
title: Maskerade
